lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beginning with the first of three sponsors tonight: Ravensburger. Sam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, no, why am I dressed like this? Wait, Princess Bride, goblet of wine-- are you trying to poison me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you sniff your glass and tell me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is odorless, tasteless, dissolves instantly, and is among the most deadly poisons known to man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The disgusting foul flask that you never wash?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other was poured directly from my cursed flask, but which is which? The battle of wits has begun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you pour the poison on mine, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So clearly you should not choose the one in front of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got the whole social distancing thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which a man like me would have taken into account! So clearly you cannot trust the goblet in front of you because I know you won't trust the goblet, then clearly I can not trust the goblet in front of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, you're just stalling now, okay? Mine is definitely the nasty one, obviously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'd like to think that, wouldn't you? But your confidence doesn't convince me, then clearly the poison is in my goblet!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't remember which one you poured it in, do you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to drink so we can play D&D.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Back to you, Matt, and we're so sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dude, his table must be so wet from all that spit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs triumphantly) So there! Go check out the game now for yourself at Bit.ly, bit.ly/CRescapetheroom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sounds terrifying. Why would anyone do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, you're supposed to thank the sponsor at the end.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you can use the new sponsorship doll to do that for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? SAM (V.O.): Thanks to ThinkFun for supporting our show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many did you record for this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we're going to put that away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, third sponsor, D&D Beyond! Our friends since the beginning of campaign two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got something to talk about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So happy. It always gets to have some applause.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've got some awesome chapter breaks with some art in there, which is fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really cute. You want to see it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can pass it to you because we're married.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And there's, like, a little special something in it that I'm not going to talk about, but if you get it, you'll know. Ha! Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have our Marquet Market tote bags in this fabulous avocado green color.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. It's so pretty, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got our-- Oh, have you seen this yet, Marisha? We've got our Swoleregard--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does it say on the bottom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It says for Swoleregard's Gym, Wildemount, Exandria.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's so good. Look at her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then this thing is only available-- (laughter) - in the U.S. store right now, but it's coming to the UK and the Australian store soon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice save, nice save. You're on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to have Liam show it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is our Vax'ildan hooded cloak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, with that thumb hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So no, you have to turn around because they didn't see the wings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got to show them the wings, the Raven Queen wings in the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got thumb holes, and there's all these--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your snow drop close to the heart, and then we've got a dagger, dagger, dagger detail, and then we've got, "Do not far from me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All sorts of stuff on there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anyway, it's in the stores right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was wearing it today at home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a good arms dealer outfit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You look like a cool Jedi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. And then there's two more things I'm just going to say, and I'm done. I swear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we have this t-shirt, which you may recognize, the design is on our tank tops that we released.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So in the Australian store, it's a t-shirt!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you for sitting with me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice job, LB! Nice job! That's a lot of weeks off to catch up. Nice job.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I couldn't find them, but there they are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just love it so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other things are cool, too!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you all are scrambling around the rainy space surrounding the grave site of Mollymauk Tealeaf, Jester, you return from your vision.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was there on his own accord?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, didn't you send him back to the earth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, mostly metaphorically, to be honest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not anything that sticks, necessarily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send him a message.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to see what he's doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we maybe want to talk about this a little bit further before you stick your finger into that beehive?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, if you send him a message, he may-- we'll ruin the element of surprise, if that's something that we want to keep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but what if he's trying to find us, to contact us and he doesn't know--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's looking in the wrong place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, that's someone from his past, which means maybe he has some sort of memory, unless Cree was responsible for helping to bring him back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wasn't she part of that group that did that before?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, maybe she knows how to bring people back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We delivered the news that Molly died to Cree, didn't we?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. If only one of us took notes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Told The Gentleman? But Cree was still around at that time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cree was around and working under him at the time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is surprising, but I don't know that we should be--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, because he told us his origin story, No, because he told us his origin story, and now he is traveling with the very people he was with before his return from the earth the first time, the second time, the ninth time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you send him a message and not-Molly doesn't recognize your voice, then--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll know it's not him, for sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How does a message work? If you don't go, "Hi, it's me, Jester," do they know it's you, or just a voice appears?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think if they've met me, they know it's me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, if your friend was going to leave word, he could have, which either means that things are different or that it's for some strange reason, it's too dangerous to contact you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: *Ja**. I put it in his coat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the note still in the coat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he leave a reply in the coat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but it's still a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to take the one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A heavy inspection of the interior of the coat, and there were a number of pockets sewn into it, hidden spaces-- nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I never noticed the wings on the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's comfortable, but also sexy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's got to remember us, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if it's just brand new every time, or maybe Molly was a failed version of the ritual, and maybe this time it wasn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could just be like, "Oh my god, you came back! How are you feeling?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, right now, I mean, right now you've contacted Cree twice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But just to say like, "Hey, how's Molly?" I didn't go like, "Hey Cree--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She doesn't know that you know where she is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if you also contact Anti-Mauk, what are we going to call it? He's not Mollymauk any more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nonagon is right in the middle, I guess.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess we could ask him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyway, if we contacted him, even if he doesn't recognize you, he's going to turn to his good friend Cree and be like, "Hey, I just heard a voice in my head," and she's going to be like, "Oh shit, they're coming for us!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like the sales call, like, are you interested in a new HVAC unit? Press one to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you still talk to plants?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah, you gave me the ability, after all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There gotta be-- Are there things growing in the earth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there are low bushes and some trees.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They would know when the earth got dug up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go and talk to a nearby shrub or some grass in this area or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there are elements of crabgrass clusters amongst the mud as well as some stunted bushes and small trees that are scattered throughout this plains area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to kneel down on the ground and get really low and talk to the crabgrass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you feel a great disturbance in the ground lately? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, there was a guy under there and then some people came by and then they took him out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There were multiple people that took him out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, it was a small group or something."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you, I mean, I know it's hard to tell time, but do you have any idea how many, like, you know, suns and moons there were, or hot and colds there were? Or, I don't know, do you know how long ago it was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't follow. I don't-- Oh, you just mean, like, a cycle?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd put it at maybe 50 or so cycles back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, that was a while! You have a good memory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you know, not all crabgrass is as cool as me." (laughter) "What's your name, by the way?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm Jester! Do you have a name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Henry Crabgrass, and I'll pet Henry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Henry a single blade of crabgrass or is he--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a cluster of crabgrass roots that encompass a hive crabgrass mind, if you will, that is now known as Henry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you feel how many people? Did you get an idea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, it's kind of hard to tell when, you know, you're grass." (laughter) "I remember feeling a bunch of footprints."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did Molly come up on his own or?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, when the body came out of the ground, was he moving or did he start moving after he was out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I heard some digging and then I heard some chanting."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you hear what they were chanting? Can you repeat any of it? You have a good memory, after all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To be fair, I don't really know what language is! It's really wild."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all downhill for Henry from here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Henry, is there anything you want? Is there anything you need? Can I do anything for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's nice to have someone to talk to."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (worried noise) Tell you what, we'll stick around for at least 10 more minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can dig up Henry and take him with us in, like, a pot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I accidentally break parts of Henry off?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's not turn this into a horror story.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Henry's just going to get eaten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is bringing up all sorts of weird stuff, you guys, because when we step on grass, are we hurting it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it hurt when I step on you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now I know why Essek flies everywhere: he's got a heart of gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a little pressure tingle."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, is the grass upsetting you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's not saying terrible things to you? I'll summon the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to, if it's okay, Henry, I'm just going to keep petting the grass.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does he want any water or anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't want to waterlog him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Caduceus, you know could speak to plants this the whole time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, yeah, you sit on a horse, these things happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He seemed like he thought it was okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My friend Yasha is petting you, too, now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to ask if it's okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: May I give you scritches, Henry?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's alive, and he's walking through the snow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because you've scryed, does that give us a location that we could somehow bamf to, or it doesn't matter?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not any closer to his location? Hasn't given us an advantage in trying to find him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't see anything around it other than snow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it took them that long to get up there and they can't get there any faster.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're already-- they have such a headstart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but we can catch up in--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't know how deep into the tundra that they are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That delivery to that point might not be as reliable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So should we tear up the rest of our plans for the week and just go now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think Vess has a set itinerary, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a lot of options for keeping tabs on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And if we were able to look successfully once, we could do it again, as long as we're not detected.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They didn't seem to notice when I did it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'd probably prefer to keep an eye on them, but not alarm whoever they are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what do we do? Where do we go? What are we doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kind of hard to focus after that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I understand, Jester, after learning so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So maybe we just continue and wait? Oh god, that sounds awful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're also waiting on commissions for some heavy clothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't wait to wear it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a hundred percent with you, but wait, talk to Vess to accelerate her plans?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What Fjord said earlier or whoever, it's very coincidental that Mollymauk and Cree are going to the exact same spot we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's literally what Beauregard said to us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But yeah, no, I'm definitely paying attention but we can't-- should we not tell Vess that we know that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- there's another entity there? I mean, she might have sent them, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does she know about the Tomb Takers?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everything has been pointing to this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless we come up with some excuse that doesn't involve the Tomb Takers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't they steal her book or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we just loosely ask her--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And just be like, hey, were you part of the Tomb Takers? Did they steal your book?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She contracted the Tomb Takers or the Tomb Takers contracted her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like this is a conversation for in person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we stirring up with?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's an arms race.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's going to want to know that they're out there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we're the people who are racing against them for whatever endgame they're both chasing towards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Take Tombers! No, that's stupid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do feel like this is an opportunity to make up ground and otherwise, oh boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think she'd be interested in going sooner if we let her know that other people are that far ahead of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We still need to get our stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can always do a little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe you ordered them before the dinner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Besides, we're not singing "I Talk to the Trees" for a good five minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you have-- there's some of the commissions that are three more days before they were ready.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What day is it? It's still sooner than--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We had like six days left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you still have-- you'd be two days early if you were to wait for the commission.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And if they seem to be getting closer to their goal, we can say, all right, we got to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, or we could go drop more money on those people and be like, "Work around the clock."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think this is a conversation to have with Vess DeRogna in person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I let her know we're coming to talk to her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got all this writing on my arm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to impose on the same magic circle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. We're going back to Rexxentrum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. If we're going to see her-- she was in Rexxentrum, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Anything we were going to do in Shadycreek?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I think we figured out everything we needed to, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, they're probably all-- We would just find out they're all up in the north, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a night of sleep we could--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can go to Rexxentrum and then go back to Zadash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. We can go to Rexxentrum, talk to her, go to Zadash, pick up our stuff and your family, and-- what are we going to do with your family?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We really could get your-- As long as we use circles, we can go get your family in Zadash and then go to Rexxentrum, because there's circles in both cities and I'm still capable of traveling to both places today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we go to Zadash, we drop more money on these people, we'll be like, "Go faster with your commissions," pick up family, then to Rexxentrum, then go back to Zadash, then go back to Rexxentrum, and then head out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we just take a couple of days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also think a couple more days figuring out what we know might be-- like, are they actually going to the same place that we're going? Let's confirm that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can send them a message.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no, we can just-- I just figured Commune might do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, or you can ask your god, right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gods know a lot of things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They do, and your friend seems to know some stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's got a nice-- well, we have to wait a day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could do it today, but I already communed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I think it gets weird if you keep doing it, if I recall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who am I sending message to, to let them know we're coming?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send the message to Yudala Fon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what do you say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ey-oh, we're coming through! Get ready because it's happening right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Beau with the Mighty Nein.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Beau with the Mighty Nein coming through any second now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Brief pause before they respond with a, "A very curious notification, but of course, you are welcome." That's all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it still raining on us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So "any second" really means about a half hour because first I will ritually cast the dome and then I'll pull out some rags and start wiping down the stone that I have found to draw the circle on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't you draw it in the mud?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, the chalk does not-- no, it cannot hold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you just dig in the mud with your finger?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure? I think it is a pretty lax rules.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put a bunch of stones in a circle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, you can search for a stone surface that might function for this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know of any big stones in the area? Big enough for a bunch of people to stand on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I noticing any kind of shifts in the blades as he says that way and that way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just hear it in the voice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's some over that way and some over that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look over and there's, like, some stones, like, six inches, four inches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check if you want to with disadvantage because of the heavy rain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long does that spell stay up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still not a perfect flat surface, but it is large enough. If you push some of the mud away and put the dome over and dry it off for a moment, you could probably get it to work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and this is the kill site for Molly, you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whereabouts would you like to go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go talk to Vess?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, should we check in with her? Do you need to do another thing or?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll send a message to Vess DeRogna.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm out of practice. That shit's hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, I can be there within the next four or so hours if you'll be around."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She says she'll be home in four or so hours.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We could try to hurry up our jackets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything else we can do here? Should we just fast forward four hours?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Warm pretzel, definitely, and, like, some cocoa, because it was pretty cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We go get warm pretzels and cocoa and mulled wine.
